s2.name: stable distribution from OW2 Forge
s2.p: The JORAM source and binary packages are available from the OW2 Forge.

ul.li: joram-5.*.zip, including JORAM libraries and the JORAM samples sources;
joram-5.*-src.zip, including JORAM sources;
joram-5.*-javadoc.jar, including JORAM javadoc;
joram-jca-jonas-5.*.rar, JCA Adapter for Jonas;
joram-jca-remote-5.*.rar, the resource adapter for a collocated JORAM server within any J2EE compliant application server.
joram-jca-ra-5.*.rar, the resource adapter for a collocated JORAM server within any J2EE compliant application server.
joram-5.*-raconfig.zip, facilities enabling configuration of JCA rars.

s2.p:
The license agreement is displayed before the download can start.
Click here to start the download process.

Note: all the packages are available as .zip files. To unzip these files, just go where you want to install JORAM, and unzip it (see here for a quick start guide). Please consult the JORAM documentation for installation instructions and a tutorial.

s2.name: Latest snpashots from Continuous Integration Build Tool
s2.p: The latest development snapshots are available from Continuous Integration Build Tool:

ul.li: joram-release-5.*-SNAPSHOT.zip, including JORAM libraries and the JORAM samples sources;
joram-release-5.*-SNAPSHOT-src.zip, including JORAM sources;
joram-jca-jonas-5.*-SNAPSHOT.rar, JCA Adapter for Jonas;
joram-jca-remote-5.*-SNAPSHOT.rar, the resource adapter for a collocated JORAM server within any J2EE compliant application server.
joram-jca-ra-5.*-SNAPSHOT.rar, the resource adapter for a collocated JORAM server within any J2EE compliant application server.
joram-release-5.*-SNAPSHOT-raconfig.zip, facilities enabling configuration of JCA rars.

s2.p: This will be built automatically from the current development code after each change in the SVN code base.

If you need quickly a fix for a particular bug, you may be able to find a fixed Joram release here well before the fix makes it into the next release version. On the other hand, these snapshots might sometimes be unstable.
The JavaDoc of the version in development is generated each day at 00:00 AM CEST, it is available at: here.
Joram nightly builds (snapshots) are also available from the OW2 Maven repository: http://repository.ow2.org/nexus, GroupId is org.ow2.joram

s2.name: JORAM SVN code base
s2.p: For getting the latest stable JORAM version, or for the current development release, you have to use SVN.

Joram, Xoram (C/C++ client API) and kJoram (J2ME client API) are respectively available by checking out the joram, xoram or kjoram modules. The tests module contains the tests for all the components of Joram.

The latest stable release tag and the description of all Joram's versions can be found in Code updates. For getting the current development release (potentially unstable), check out joram with no tag.
Snapshots of the SVN code base are generated each day at 00:00 AM CEST, they are available at:

ul.li: Joram.
kJoram.
Xoram.
Tests.

s2.p: You can find the corresponding JavaDoc here.

s2.name: Maven access
s2.p: Joram libraries are available on the maven repository http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/ow2/joram. Be careful, since Joram 5.8 GroupId is org.ow2.joram (older releases are available with org.objectweb.joram GroupId).

ul.li: a3-common, a3-rt and a3-osgi for the asynchronous middleware,
joram-client-jms, joram-shared and joram-mom-core for JMS client and server implementation,
jndi-client, jndi-shared and jndi-server for the JNDI implementation.

For specialized destinations:
joram-mom-extensions-collector,
joram-mom-extensions-ftp,
joram-mom-extensions-jmsbridge,
joram-mom-extensions-amqp,
joram-mom-extensions-mail,
joram-mom-extensions-scheduler

For JCA adapter:
joram-client-jca, or
joram-security-jonas.
